panels.content:
ICMP RTT

Probe duration of RTT(Round Trip Time) of ICMP module(Blackbox exporter) for each instance on server group.
Help to detect network spikes for each instance on time interval.

options.content:
ICMP RTT

Probe duration of RTT(Round Trip Time) of ICMP module(Blackbox exporter) for each instance on server group.
Help to detect network spikes for each instance on time interval.

panels.content:
ICMP setup & ICMP resolve

Probe duration of setup and resolve phase of ICMP module(Blackbox exporter) for each instance on server group.

options.content:
ICMP setup & ICMP resolve

Probe duration of setup and resolve phase of ICMP module(Blackbox exporter) for each instance on server group.

panels.content:
ICMP RTT (packet lost)

Visualisation probe duration on each instance in server group with RTT phase every 5 min.
Heatmap for probe status 0 is shown in red colour. If probe status is a success then heatmap is displayed in different shades.

options.content:
ICMP RTT (packet lost)

Visualisation probe duration on each instance in server group with RTT phase every 5 min.
Heatmap for probe status 0 is shown red colour and for probe status success, it depends on probe duration time.

panels.content:
HTTP status

Probe HTTP status code of http_2xx module(Blackbox exporter) for each instance on server group. On Y-axis display count value of HTTP status for each instance.
Better results on larger time range.

Legend: instance [HTTP status code]

options.content:
HTTP duration

Probe duration of http_2xx module(Blackbox exporter) for each instance on server group.
Display probe duration of all phases; connect, processing, resolve, tls, transfer
